author: ghurir
long_description:
This is a less punishing alternative to hardcore.
Set the initial maximum hearts that a player can have from the configuration (10 by default), and every time he dies he will start with 1 max hearts less.
Once he has zero hearts the player is banned.

I recommend you also install and preconfigure the[ HUD bars](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/hudbars/) mod so you can see what your max amount of hearts is.
Note: voxelibre doesn't seem to work with the HUD bars mod
name: heartcore
short_description: Everytime you die you lose a heart, and at zero hearts you die permanently.
title: HeartCore
